file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 05-50-24-06 - LH/RH STATIC PORTS VICINITY - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL LH/RH STATIC PORTS VICINITY - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the damage assessment on the AREAS I and II, in the vicinity the LH/RH static ports . B. These procedures are applicable if the aircraft was operating under the RVSM condition when the damage was detected. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY LH/RH STATIC PORTS VICINITY - IN- ALL 05-50-24-200-801-A SPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 05-50-24 Page 1 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 05-50-24-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. LH/RH STATIC PORTS VICINITY - INSPECTION A. General (1) This task presents the damage evaluation process for damage on the LH/RH anemometric static ports vicinity (Areas I and II). Refer to Figure 604 and Figure 605. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION RVSM CRITICAL REGION (SKIN) FOR WAVINESS - AMM TASK 34-13-04-200-801-A/600 INSPECTION SRM 53-00-22/AD - SRM 53-12-01/AD - SRM 53-21-01/AD - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Fuselage I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. J. Damage assessment SUBTASK 720-002-A (1) Follow the procedures described in the damage evaluation process flowchart shown in Figure 601 and Figure 602. NOTE: • The flowchart makes reference to SRM 53-00-22/AD, SRM 53-12-01/AD, SRM 53-21-01/AD and AMM TASK 34-13-04-200-801-A/600. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-50-24 Page 2 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • Use Figure 603 to report the damage to Embraer Technical Support Department. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Put the aircraft back to its initial condition. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-50-24 Page 3 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

N DAMAGE WITHIN THE NON-RVSM ALLOWED Y N LIMITS? CONTACT OPERATE EMBRAER (SEE SRM 53-21-01-AD OR RVSM 53-12-01-AD, AS APPLICABLE) OPERATE NON-RVSM 1. PERFORM SKINWAVINESS MEASUREMENT ACCORDING TO AMM 34-13-04-200-801-A AND SEND THE RESULTS TO EMBRAER/AEROMECH. OPERATOR END EMBRAER EMBRAER EMBRAER / AEROMECH ISSUES THE ANALYSIS DISPOSITIONS N SKINWAVINESS MEASUREMENT ALLOWS RVSM OPERATION? Y AEROMECH ISSUES THE CONFORMITY CERTIFICATE EM145AMM050959A.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-50-24 Page 4 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: AIRCRAFT NOT COVERED BY OR POST-MOD SB 145-34-0110 Damage Assessment Flowchart Figure 602 START APPLICABLE TO DAMAGE INSIDE AREA I AND AREA II IS THE Y DAMAGE WITHIN THE LIMITS REWORK AS OPERATE (SEE SRM 53-00-22-AD) ? SRM 53-00-22-AD RVSM N IS DAMAGE WITHIN THE N Y NON-RVSM ALLOWED LIMITS? CONTACT EMBRAER (SEE SRM 53-21-01-AD OR 53-12-01-AD, AS APPLICABLE) OPERATE NON-RVSM 1. PERFORM SKIN WAVINESS MEASUREMENT ACCORDING TO AMM 34-13-04-200-801-A END EMBRAER FOLLOW THE INSTRUCTIONS ISSUES THE PRESENTED IN AMM 34-13-04-200-801-A DISPOSITIONS EMBRAER / AEROMECH ANALYSIS N DOES THE ANALYSIS PRESENTED IN AMM 34-13-04-200-801-A ALLOW RVSM OPERATION? Y OPERATOR ISSUES THE CONFORMITY CERTIFICATE EM145AMM050704B.DGN EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 05-50-24 Page 5 of 9 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Damage Report Template Figure 603 - Sheet 1 A A W 2 L X 1 Y REFERENCE LINE Y 1 X SCRATCH, NICK OR GOUGE 3 L 2 W DET. A 1 MEASURE THE DIMENSIONS X, Y, W, L AND H, WHERE H IS THE DEPTH OF DENT OR BLEND-OUT. DO A SKETCH AND REPORT TO EMBRAER TECHNICAL SUPPORT DEPARTMENT. 2 DENT OR REWORKED AREA CONTOUR. 3 AREA II BOUNDARIES (PAINTED ON FUSELAGE).
